name: School sim 1.0 (unfinished)
description: hey lads i made this. it is NOT FINISHEd i'm only like halfway done which means it just knda cuts off in the middle and then prints some random dialog i put there to test shit out and also there's a bunch of stuff in there that's either 1) stupid or 2) doesn't make sense (spoiler: everything fits into one of those). i'm only uploading here cos my friend wanted to try what i have so far lol. hmu on tungle @ videogamenpc if u have ideas for this cos i sure as hell dont i'm pulling this all out of my ass as i go. ok thanks see ya
